name: MCP Adapter
description: Exposes MCP server tools as native OpenClaw agent tools

servers.description: List of MCP servers to connect to

name.description: Unique name for this server (used as tool prefix)

toolPrefix.description: Prefix tool names with server name

servers.label: MCP Servers
servers.description: Configure MCP servers to connect to. Each server will expose its tools as OpenClaw agent tools.

name.label: Server Name
name.description: A unique identifier for this server. This name will be used as a prefix for all tools from this server.

transport.label: Transport Type
transport.description: How to connect to this MCP server

options.label: Standard I/O
options.hint: Spawn a child process and communicate via stdin/stdout

options.label: HTTP
options.hint: Connect to an HTTP endpoint that exposes MCP protocol

command.label: Command
command.description: The command to spawn (for stdio transport)

env.label: Environment Variables
env.description: Key-value pairs of environment variables to pass to the command (for stdio transport)

url.label: Server URL
url.description: The MCP server endpoint URL (for http transport)

headers.label: Request Headers
headers.description: HTTP headers to include in requests (for http transport). Common headers: Authorization, Content-Type

toolPrefix.label: Prefix Tool Names
toolPrefix.description: If enabled, tool names will include the server name as a prefix (e.g., 'android-vlm_task' instead of 'task'). Recommended to avoid conflicts.
